article_title: What Healthcare.gov Can Teach Enterprise CIOs

article_metadata.description: Barack Obama may go down as the first president in American history to have his legacy tarnished by a bad website. Meanwhile, much less visibly, in large enterprises around the world, the same failures have played themselves out for years. Mr. President, enterprise CIOs feel your pain. Healthcare.gov, the website that facilitates [...]
article_metadata.author: Jesse Lipson
